sqldiff.help:
USE: The diffs are ordered by datamodel version number. The script can be run in a top down fashion and is expected to not failor overwrite old data
EXPECT: - "use business-database-name;" was called prior to calling this script

diff.author: Chuyen Nguyen
diff.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS rks_category (id integer not null auto_increment, name varchar(255), description varchar(500), created_on datetime, created_by varchar(255), retired bit, parent_id integer, primary key (id)); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS rks_category_money (id integer not null auto_increment, transaction_type varchar(255), description varchar(500), amount decimal(19,2), created_on datetime,date_income_outcome datetime, created_by varchar(255), retired bit, sub_category_id integer, primary key (id));
